License: http://www.gnu.org/licenses

DISCLAIMER: The latitude/longitude listed is approximate and only used for distance calculation and does not reflect actual repeater location."

The repeater information have been gathered from public domain sources including (but not limited to) Amateur Radio Club websites, logbooks, publicly-accessible database and individual contributors. Although repeater information is accurate at release time, be advised that details such as trasmitting/receiving frequency, tones and location may change without notice, thus information update through users/contributors are much appreciated.

This app works better with GPS or Location Service. Enabling these allow automatic detection of Amateur Radio Repeater near you.

Would you like to enable Location Service now?
Fill in new repeater details that you want to suggest. Use this only for suggesting new repeater.
